definition: yolk sac (ectodermal cells attaching fetus to uterus before the development of the placenta)

sentences.english: Ooplasm was gradually filled up with yolk granules, and the membrane of the germinal vesicle began to disappear.
sentences.chinese: 卵黄球形成逐渐充满卵质，胚泡膜逐渐消失。

sentences.english: Adding yolk to a little egg was a recipe for a female.
sentences.chinese: 反之，往小蜥蜴卵中添加卵黄，他们孵出了雌性蜥蜴。

sentences.english: Immature vitelline cells have relatively little cytoplasm, many free ribosomes.
sentences.chinese: 两种吸虫卵黄细胞发育过程比较相似。

sentences.english: The secondary yolk sac( YS ) is the first extraembryonic structure that can be detected with ultrasonography in the chorionic cavity.
sentences.chinese: 卵黄囊是妊娠囊内超声能见的第一个解剖结构。

sentences.english: The dye trypan blue has a remarkable biphasic effect on pinocytosis by yolk sal .
sentences.chinese: 染料锥虫蓝对卵黄囊的胞饮作用具有明显的双向作用。

sentences.english: Vitellogenin is the key factor in vitellogenesis in insects.
sentences.chinese: 卵黄原蛋白是昆虫卵黄发生的关键物质。

sentences.english: Vitellogenin is the key factor in vitellogenesis in insects.
sentences.chinese: 卵黄原蛋白是昆虫卵黄发生的关键物质。

sentences.english: The granulosa increasingly disintegrated and the yolk platelet came into being in the oocyte in vitellogenesis .
sentences.chinese: 后期颗粒层解体，卵母细胞内出现大量的卵黄小板。

sentences.english: These histological structure changes of MO reach to the top at vitellogenesis stage.
sentences.chinese: 到卵黄发生期，大颚器的这些形态结构变化到达顶峰。

sentences.english: The yolk sac is gradually vascularized.
sentences.chinese: 卵黄囊逐渐被血管化了。

sentences.english: At the end stage of vitellogenesis, Golgi complex began to disintegrate, so its number decreased.
sentences.chinese: 卵黄发生后期，高尔基复合体开始解体，数量减少。

sentences.english: The cultured vitelline cells from adult Schistosoma japonica were observed ultrastructurally.
sentences.chinese: 从超微结构水平研究日本血吸虫卵黄细胞培养的动态。

sentences.english: The knowledge of tick vitellogenesis is preliminary, and further research should be made in many aspects.
sentences.chinese: 对蜱类卵黄发生了解得尚少，在许多方面需深入研究。

sentences.english: There were positive reaction of two proteins in yolk granules of oocyte.
sentences.chinese: 卵母细胞的卵黄颗粒上两种蛋白均呈现阳性反应。
卵黄抗体热稳定性检测。

sentences.english: The functions of the mitochondria and yolk precursor granules during vitellogenesis process are discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了线粒体与卵黄前颗粒在卵黄形成中的作用。

definition: yolk sac (ectodermal cells attaching fetus to uterus before the development of the placenta)
trophoblastic layer (attaches fertilized ovum to the uterus)/trophoderm
